old

Class ProgramLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • old.ProgramLogger

  • public class ProgramLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    The logger for the program. This logger saves all log data in a plain text file in the default user directory. The logging level by default is set to INFO, however the setLevel() method allows the program to incorporate an option to manually enable logging at a more sensitive level if an error needs to be debugged.

    For maintaining a standard logging format, please conform all log entries to the format provided in the ProgramLoggerFormat class. The only logging levels used should be the ones for which there are static final fields provided in this class.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Craig

    • Field Detail

      • FINEST

        public static final int FINEST
        The most sensitive logging level. Logs all events.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INFO

        public static final int INFO
        The middle sensitivity logging level. Logs important events and procedural program actions.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SEVERE

        public static final int SEVERE
        The least sensitive logging level, enabled by default. Only logs very important events.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • fh

        private java.util.logging.FileHandler fh
        FileHandler for saving the log to a plain text file.

      • LOGGER

        private final java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER
        The logger object shared to all classes in this program.

        public boolean configureHandlers()
        Configures the Logger's handlers to be a single FileHandler
        Returns:

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(int level)
        Allows the program to include an option to manually adjust the logging level. Useful for debugging problems.
        Parameters:
        level - the level the logger's file handler should be set to.

      • log

        public void log(java.util.logging.Level level,
                java.lang.String sourceClass,
                java.lang.String sourceMethod,
                java.lang.String msg)
        Helper method to pass logging data to the shared Logger instance.
        Parameters:
        level - the logging event's Level.
        sourceClass - the Class where the log event occurred.
        sourceMethod - the Method where the log event occurred.
        msg - the message associated with this logging event.
